header.description: No header-level data required for this report.

rows.description: Each row represents one database connection target with its configuration and current health status.

totals.description: No totals row required for this report.

semantics: All row tokens are direct column passthroughs from app_db_targets. No filtering logic, no parameter-based subsetting—every row in the table appears in the output.
transformations: No transformations needed—data flows directly from app_db_targets table columns to report row tokens.
